trans-unit.source: Represents the binding element that is used when the client must expose an endpoint for the service to send messages back to the client.
trans-unit.target: 表示客户端必须公开服务以将消息发送回客户端的终结点时使用的绑定元素。

trans-unit.source: This is commonly used with transports, such as HTTP, that do not allow duplex communications natively.
trans-unit.target: 这通常适用于本身不允许进行双工通信的传输，如 HTTP。

trans-unit.source: TCP, by contrast, does allow duplex communications natively and so does not require the use of this binding element for the service to send messages back to a client.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，TCP 本身允许进行双工通信，和因此不要求服务以将消息发送回客户端此绑定元素使用。

trans-unit.source: The client must expose an address at which the service can contact it to establish a connection from the service to the client.
trans-unit.target: 客户端必须公开一个地址，在该服务可以联系它以建立与客户端从服务的连接。

trans-unit.source: This client address is provided by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CompositeDuplexBindingElement.ClientBaseAddress%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此客户端地址由<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CompositeDuplexBindingElement.ClientBaseAddress%2A>属性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CompositeDuplexBindingElement.ClientBaseAddress%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] auto-generates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CompositeDuplexBindingElement.ClientBaseAddress%2A> if one is not explicitly set by the user.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]自动生成<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CompositeDuplexBindingElement.ClientBaseAddress%2A>如果其中一个未显式设置用户。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CompositeDuplexBindingElement.ClientBaseAddress%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CompositeDuplexBindingElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CompositeDuplexBindingElement"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base address for the client.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置客户端的基址。

trans-unit.source: This property provides an address at which the service can contact the client.
trans-unit.target: 此属性提供的服务可以与联系客户端的地址。

trans-unit.source: A `null` value causes the system to automatically generate a client base address.
trans-unit.target: A`null`值会导致系统自动生成客户端基址。

trans-unit.source: This is a base address, not an absolute address.
trans-unit.target: 这是基址，而不是绝对地址。

trans-unit.source: A GUID is appended to the base address when generating client endpoints from this binding.
trans-unit.target: 从该绑定生成客户端终结点时，GUID 会追加到基址。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> that contains the base address for the client.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Uri>包含基址的客户端。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Returns a deep clone of the current binding element.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前绑定元素的深层克隆。

trans-unit.source: Returning a clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element.
trans-unit.target: 返回克隆使运行时以支持多个自定义绑定共自定义绑定元素的情况。

trans-unit.source: If a clone is not returned, the run-time behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果未返回克隆，运行时行为不确定。

trans-unit.source: A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象的深层克隆创建对象的副本以及直接或间接引用该对象的所有内容的副本。

trans-unit.source: (This is also called copying the entire object graph.) A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only.
trans-unit.target: （这也称为复制整个对象图。）浅表克隆，与此相反，是对象的只是对象的对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果对象包含对其他对象的引用，则浅表复制不创建所引用的对象; 的副本相反，它会复制对原始对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: In particular, a deep copy of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CompositeDuplexBindingElement> copies over the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CompositeDuplexBindingElement.ClientBaseAddress%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言的深层副本<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CompositeDuplexBindingElement>会通过复制<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CompositeDuplexBindingElement.ClientBaseAddress%2A>值。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CompositeDuplexBindingElement.ClientBaseAddress%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CompositeDuplexBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CompositeDuplexBindingElement"></xref> that is a deep clone of the current binding element.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CompositeDuplexBindingElement"> </xref> ，它是当前绑定元素的深层克隆。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Exports custom policy assertions about bindings that represent the presence of composite duplex in the binding.
trans-unit.target: 导出有关绑定表示出现复合双工绑定中的自定义策略断言。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter"></xref> that you can use to modify the exporting process.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter"> </xref>可用来修改导出过程。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext"></xref> that you can use to insert your custom policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext"> </xref>可用来插入自定义策略断言。

trans-unit.target: contextis .
